dcterms:description: A modified version of Sinergym is used to simulate buildings in different weather conditions, utilizing the EnergyPlus simulation engine to model the dynamics of building systems.
dcterms:title: Sinergym

dcterms:description: EnergyPlus is a new-generation building energy simulation program that allows for detailed modeling of building energy consumption.
dcterms:title: EnergyPlus

dcterms:creator: S. Wilcox
W. Marion
dcterms:description: TMY data sets provide hourly meteorological information from specific weather stations over the course of one year, representing typical weather conditions.
dcterms:title: TMY (Typical Meteorological Year)
mls:task: Weather simulation for building energy modeling
